events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position, showing strong experience in backend development and cloud services.
Application has been reviewed and classified under the Engineering cluster based on the candidate's software development background and skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide the candidate through the recruitment process efficiently.
Initial screening completed successfully; candidate demonstrated good knowledge of software engineering principles and problem-solving skills.
Candidate responded promptly with availability for the next steps and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity to join the engineering team.
Technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering panel to further evaluate the candidate's coding and system design skills.
